channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: SQL Server MVP Deep Dives
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLGlenn
item.dc:creator: SQLGlenn
item.description: Great, now I'll have to pull the book on the shelf, dust it off and starting reading. Jes, you make me want to finally start reading the book I've had for so long. Good job.
item.content:encoded: Great, now I’ll have to pull the book on the shelf, dust it off and starting reading. Jes, you make me want to finally start reading the book I’ve had for so long. Good job.

item.title: By: Marlon Ribunal
item.dc:creator: Marlon Ribunal
item.description: Nice review! The best thing about this SQL Server MVP Deep Dives series is that it introduces you to things you didn't know existed. Many find themselves in AHA-moments when they come across solutions they did't think of. This book and all succeeding volumes are valuable to any SQL Server pro :-)<br />
item.content:encoded: Nice review! The best thing about this SQL Server MVP Deep Dives series is that it introduces you to things you didn’t know existed. Many find themselves in AHA-moments when they come across solutions they did’t think of. This book and all succeeding volumes are valuable to any SQL Server pro ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Good review. I always try to read as many books as possible on a subject, you will always find some interesting stuff and something you didn't know...even if it is the 20th book you read on the same subject....and since repetition makes perfect, the more books you read the more you will retain (hopefully)
item.content:encoded: Good review. I always try to read as many books as possible on a subject, you will always find some interesting stuff and something you didn’t know…even if it is the 20th book you read on the same subject….and since repetition makes perfect, the more books you read the more you will retain (hopefully)

item.title: By: Glenn Berry
item.dc:creator: Glenn Berry
item.description: Nice review, Jes. Now you just need to read and review SQL Server MVP Deep Dives Volume 2! Thanks for the mention, too.
item.content:encoded: Nice review, Jes. Now you just need to read and review SQL Server MVP Deep Dives Volume 2! Thanks for the mention, too.
